trans-unit.note: A notification channel; so the user can subscribe to "General Notifications"
Accessible name for a button. %1 is the version number of the VPN client.
Refers to the installed version. For example: 'Release Version: 1.23'

Used by screen readers to explain to users which item they are currently focused on, and how many items there are total in a group. For example, given a list with 15 items. If a user selects the 3rd item, we want the screen reader to read out "3 of 15". The %1 represents the index of the currently focused item by the screen reader. The %2 represents the total number of items in the group.

Used by screen readers to denote that a particular item is currently selected. For example, given a segmented control with 2 items, where the first item is currently selected. We want the screen reader to read out "Selected, <item name>". The %1 represents the name of the selected item.

trans-unit.source: You must turn off your VPN in order to see the portal, and turn it back on once you have logged in.
trans-unit.target: Debes apagar tu VPN para poder ver el portal y volver a encenderla una vez que hayas iniciado sesión.

trans-unit.source: You can turn on your VPN once you have gained internet access by logging in to the portal.
trans-unit.target: Puedes activar tu VPN una vez que hayas obtenido acceso a Internet iniciando sesión en el portal.

trans-unit.source: A captive portal is when the guest Wi-Fi you are using requires you to log in to get internet access.
trans-unit.target: Un portal cautivo es cuando el Wi-Fi de invitados que estás utilizando requiere que inicies sesión para tener acceso a Internet.

trans-unit.note: Accessible label for the button that shows the IP info panel when clicked.

trans-unit.source: Looks like there was an unexpected error while trying to connect. Please try again or check your connection.
trans-unit.target: Parece que se presentó un error mientras se intentaba conectar. Por favor, intenta de nuevo o revisa tu conexión.

trans-unit.note: Exit server IP label for IPV4. IP is the abbreviation for Internet Procol. This is followed by the user’s IPv4 address.
Exit server IP label for IPv6. IPv6 is the abbreviation for Internet Procol version 6. This is followed by the user’s IPv6 address.
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
Bits per second
Gigabits per second
Kilobits per second
Megabits per second
Latency of the connection
Terabits per second
Label for the upload benchmark shown in the speed test view.
Headline for a list of things that the current connection is capable of.
trans-unit.target: Con la velocidad actual, esto es para lo que tu dispositivo está optimizado:
trans-unit.source: At your current speed, here’s what your device is optimized for:

trans-unit.note: Headline for a list of suggestions for troubleshooting the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Parece que la conexión a la ubicación de este servidor está un poco lenta, puedes intentar:
trans-unit.source: It looks like the connection to this server location is a bit slow, you can try:

trans-unit.note: Shown to the user while waiting for the connection speed test results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
Title for the connection metrics view.
Accessible label for the button that opens the speed test view and initiates a speed test
This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section
This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section for multi-hop connections
trans-unit.source: Switching back to a single-hop connection

trans-unit.note: This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section
This is a description for a checkbox on the crash reporter dialog.
trans-unit.target: No mostrar esto de nuevo. Enviar automáticamente reportes de errores a Mozilla.
trans-unit.source: Don’t show this again. Autosend crash reports to Mozilla.

trans-unit.note: Main text telling the user that we are asking for permission to send a crash report.
trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN app quit unexpectedly. Would you like to send a crash report to help fix the issue?

trans-unit.note: User does not agree to send a crash report.
Label over description text section.
Main window title
User agrees to send a crash report.

trans-unit.source: To delete your VPN account, please sign in with your Firefox account password.
trans-unit.target: Para eliminar tu cuenta VPN, por favor, inicia sesión con la contraseña de tu cuenta de Firefox.

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Todas las extensiones y temas que has publicado en addons.mozilla.org serán eliminados
trans-unit.source: Any extensions and themes that you’ve published to addons.mozilla.org will be deleted

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Todas las suscripciones que hayas pagado serán canceladas (excepto Pocket)
trans-unit.source: Any paid subscriptions you have will be cancelled (Except Pocket)

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Reactivarla con este correo puede no restaurar tu información guardada
trans-unit.source: Reactivating with this email may not restore your saved information

trans-unit.note: Text that belongs to a checkbox that the user has to check in order before they can delete their account.
trans-unit.target: Puedes perder información y características guardadas entre los productos de Mozilla
trans-unit.source: You may lose saved information and features within Mozilla products

trans-unit.note: %1 is the email address that is associated with the current account
trans-unit.target: Tu cuenta de Firefox (%1) está conectada a los productos de Mozilla que te mantienen seguro y productivo en la web. Por favor, toma en cuenta que al eliminar tu cuenta:
trans-unit.source: Your Firefox account (%1) is connected to Mozilla products that keep you secure and productive on the web. Please acknowledge that by deleting your account:
Using these privacy features will override your custom DNS.
Using a custom DNS will override your preferences in the privacy features page.
trans-unit.target: El uso de un DNS personalizado reemplazará tus preferencias en la página de funciones de privacidad.

trans-unit.note: This string appears above the 'Sign up' button on mobile onboarding views
trans-unit.target: Regístrate para comenzar tu prueba gratuita de 7 días.
trans-unit.source: Sign up to start your 7-day free trial.
An unexpected error has occurred, please try again. Visit our help center below to learn how to troubleshoot this issue or contact support.
trans-unit.target: Se ha producido un error inesperado, por favor, intenta de nuevo. Visita nuestro centro de ayuda para aprender cómo solucionar este problema o contacta con el equipo de soporte.

trans-unit.note: Button label
Label for a clickable item in the Get-Help view
Accessible label for clear button
Accessible label for close button
Action used in the context of an expandable/collapsible card component
Label for button used to proceed with an action
Confirmation banner displayed after clicking a button to copy something.
Accessible button label
Label for button used in intro modals to discover new features.
Action used in the context of an expandable/collapsible card component
Label for button used in intro modals to return to the app.
Status alert text
Label for button used to not proceed with an action
Label for button to paste value from clipboard into input
Link title
Fallback string for users who have not specified a Display Name.
This is a label displayed on the password creation screen.
User has requested to send a new email containing the 6-digit pin to confirm their email address.
trans-unit.target: Hemos enviado tu código de nuevo a tu correo electrónico.
trans-unit.source: We’ve resent your code to your email.

trans-unit.note: User has been sent a verification email containing a code.
trans-unit.target: Abre tu correo e ingresa el código de verificación que te fue enviado.
trans-unit.source: Open your email and enter the verification code that was sent.
Enter your email address to continue using Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Ingresa tu dirección de correo para continuar usando Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: User message prompting user to finish creating their account to use Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Termina de crear tu cuenta de Firefox para continuar a Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.source: Finish creating your Firefox account to continue to Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: Tooltip label for the eye icon in password input
Non-op text that informs user about how Mozilla will not sell it to a third party.
trans-unit.target: Solamente usamos tu correo para crear tu cuenta o iniciar sesión. Nunca se venderá a terceros.
trans-unit.source: We only use your email to create your account or sign in. We will never sell it to a third party.

trans-unit.note: User provided did not provide a correct security code.
trans-unit.target: Código no válido. Por favor, intenta de nuevo

trans-unit.note: Generic message for when user submits incorrect email.
trans-unit.target: Correo no válido. Por favor, intenta de nuevo

trans-unit.note: User is providing us an email that is not formatted correctly. Ex. jsmith&gmail.com
trans-unit.target: Formato de correo no soportado. Por favor, intenta de nuevo con un correo diferente
trans-unit.source: Email format not supported. Please try again with a different email

trans-unit.note: User has submitted an invalid password.
trans-unit.target: Contraseña no válida. Por favor, intenta de nuevo

trans-unit.note: This is a hint for the user - they must provide a password with at least 8 characters
This is a hint for the user - password they provide must not be a common password. Ex. password.
trans-unit.target: No debe ser una contraseña común
trans-unit.source: Must not be a common password

trans-unit.note: This is a hint for the user - they must provide a password that does not match their email.
trans-unit.target: No debe ser tu dirección de correo
trans-unit.source: Must not be your email address

trans-unit.note: Headline on loading screen
App screen that informs the user there was an error signing them in - this is the message.
trans-unit.target: Se requiere el correo electrónico de la cuenta principal para iniciar sesión
trans-unit.source: Primary account email required for sign-in

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error sending them their verification code email - this is the message.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, no pudimos enviarte un código de verificación.
trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to send you a verification code.

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error sending them their verification code email - this is the title.
Checkbox label for users to opt in, when creating an account, to receive product update emails from Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Quiero recibir correos con novedades de los productos de Firefox.
trans-unit.source: I’d like to receive product update emails from Firefox.
To continue, please confirm with your Firefox account password.
trans-unit.target: Para continuar, confirma con la contraseña de tu cuenta de Firefox.

trans-unit.note: This link allows the user to request for another 6-digit verification code to be sent to their email.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for TOTP 6-digit verification code.
Label for input asking user for their security code.
User is asked for a security code from their authentication app for verification.
trans-unit.target: Abre tu aplicación de autenticación e ingresa el código de seguridad que se te proporciona.
trans-unit.source: Open your authentication app and enter the security code it provides.

trans-unit.note: Title for app screen asking user for their security code.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for 6-digit verification code from their email.
Tooltip label for the eye icon in password input
User has been unable to sign in correctly, they have a cool down period of 1 minute until they can try again.
trans-unit.target: Has realizado demasiados intentos para iniciar sesión. No podrás volver a intentarlo con esta cuenta durante 1 minuto.
trans-unit.source: You’ve made too many attempts to sign in. You won’t be able to try again with this account for 1 minute.

trans-unit.note: User has been unable to sign in correctly, they have a cool down period of 15 minutes until they can try again.
trans-unit.target: Has realizado demasiados intentos para iniciar sesión. No podrás volver a intentarlo para esta cuenta durante 15 minutos.
trans-unit.source: You’ve made too many attempts to sign in. You won’t be able to try again with this account for 15 minutes.

trans-unit.target: El inicio de sesión ha fallado

trans-unit.source: Continue to Mozilla VPN by signing in with your Firefox account
trans-unit.target: Continua a Mozilla VPN iniciando sesión con tu cuenta de Firefox

trans-unit.note: Do not remove or translate the markup '', '', ''.
trans-unit.target: Al continuar, estás de acuerdo con los Términos del Servicio y el Aviso de Privacidad.
trans-unit.source: By continuing, you agree to the Terms of Service and the Privacy Notice.

trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input element asking user for 8-digit verification code from their email.
Headline on loading screen
trans-unit.source: Waiting for sign in and subscription confirmation…

trans-unit.note: A badge shown in a message signifying that this is an important message
An action to delete a message from the users inbox
A badge shown in a message signifying an update to the app is available
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains a survey
A badge shown in a message signifying that this is a warning message
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains information about what is new in the product
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to account issues.

trans-unit.source: When you submit, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data with your email to help our support team understand your issue.
trans-unit.target: Cuando lo envíes, Mozilla VPN recopilará datos técnicos y de interacción junto con tu correo electrónico para ayudar a nuestro equipo de ayuda a comprender tu problema.

trans-unit.note: A user trying to submit feedback will use this dropdown to select the general topic related to the feedback.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to requesting new features.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to issues not covered under the other categories.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to payment and billing.

trans-unit.target: Aviso de privacidad de Mozilla VPN
Error al enviar tu solicitud de ayuda

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again.
trans-unit.target: Se ha producido un error inesperado, por favor, intenta de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: How can we help you with Mozilla VPN?

trans-unit.note: The %1 represents the email used to complete the form
trans-unit.target: Nuestro equipo de ayuda se pondrá en contacto contigo en %1 una vez que hayamos podido examinar tu problema.
trans-unit.source: Our support team will contact you at %1 once we’ve been able to look at your issue.

trans-unit.note: A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to technical issues.
Placeholder text for a search field that can be used to search through a list of languages
the description for the system lagnague radio button
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will use the default system language.

trans-unit.note: the title for the system language radio button

trans-unit.source: A safe, reliable and fast VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Una VPN rápida, segura y confiable. Hecha por los creadores de Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Your subscription is linked to another Firefox Account. You may need to sign in with a different email address.
trans-unit.target: Tu suscripción está vinculada con otra cuenta de Firefox. Puede que tengas que iniciar sesión con una dirección de correo diferente.

trans-unit.source: Visit our help center to learn more about managing your subscriptions.

trans-unit.note: Accessible label that is used for recent multi-hop server connections. “%1” represents the entry server and “%2” the exit server.
This is alt text for an arrow showing the multi-hop route between servers. e.g. Atlanta TO Copenhagen

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN routes your traffic through two servers instead of one for extra security and privacy. This may slow down your connection.
trans-unit.target: La VPN de salto múltiple dirige tu tráfico a través de dos servidores en lugar de uno para una mayor seguridad y privacidad. Esto puede ralentizar tu conexión.
¿Qué es una VPN de salto múltiple?

trans-unit.source: Exit location represents your main VPN server.
trans-unit.target: La ubicación de salida representa tu servidor VPN principal.

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: Sin resultados. Prueba una búsqueda diferente

trans-unit.note: Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the home screen
Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the messages inbox screen
Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the settings screen

trans-unit.source: To continue subscribing, please sign in to your Google Account
trans-unit.target: Para continuar con la suscripción, inicia sesión en tu cuenta de Google
Inicia sesión con tu cuenta de Google

trans-unit.note: %1 is the name of the city the VPN is connected to.
%1 is the name of the city the VPN disconnected from.
%1 is the name of the exit server, %2 is the name of the entry server.
%1 is the name of the exit server, %2 is the name of the entry server.
%1 is the name of the initial server, %2 is the name of the destination server.

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to requires action. Click to turn off VPN to see the portal.
trans-unit.target: La red Wi-Fi para invitados a la que estás conectado requiere acción. Haz clic para desactivar la VPN y ver el portal.
El portal de Wi-Fi para invitados está bloqueado

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to may not be secure. Click to turn on VPN to secure your device.
trans-unit.target: Es posible que la red Wi-Fi para invitados a la que estás conectado no sea segura. Haz clic para activar la VPN y proteger tu dispositivo.
Se detectó el portal de Wi-Fi para invitados.

trans-unit.source: Your Mozilla VPN subscription cannot be found. Please open the app to resolve this subscription issue.
trans-unit.target: No pudimos encontrar tu suscripción a Mozilla VPN. Por favor, abre la aplicación para resolver este problema de suscripción.

trans-unit.note: %1 is the Wi-Fi network name
trans-unit.target: %1 no es seguro. Haz clic aquí para activar la VPN y asegurar tu dispositivo.
trans-unit.source: %1 is not secure. Click here to turn on VPN and secure your device.

trans-unit.target: Se detectó una red Wi-Fi insegura

trans-unit.source: You can set Mozilla VPN to protect you from ads, trackers, and malware. Plus, customize your protection for specific apps.
Protecting yourself is simple: tap to connect to the VPN and you’re ready to browse safely. Mozilla VPN will start automatically for seamless protection.
trans-unit.target: Protegerte es simple: toca para conectarte a la VPN y estarás listo para navegar de manera segura. Mozilla VPN se iniciará automáticamente para una protección perfecta.

trans-unit.source: With more than 500 servers in 60 cities around the world, Mozilla VPN protects your data, browsing activity, and your true location from network spies.
trans-unit.target: Con más de 500 servidores en 60 ciudades de todo el mundo, Mozilla VPN protege tus datos, tu actividad de navegación y tu verdadera ubicación de los espías de la red.

trans-unit.source: You can quickly access Mozilla VPN from your status bar.
A fast, secure and easy to use VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.

trans-unit.note: Appears on the in-app purchase view beside a subscription plan. "%1" is replaced by the percentage amount saved when selecting that plan
Button label
%1 is replaced by the subscription duration in months. %2 is replaced by the total subscription cost.

trans-unit.source: Please continue subscribing in your browser…
trans-unit.target: Por favor, continúa suscribiéndote desde tu navegador…

trans-unit.note: %1 is the user’s email address.
trans-unit.target: No pudimos encontrar una suscripción para %1. Suscríbete ahora para proteger tu conexión.
trans-unit.source: We couldn’t find a subscription for %1. Subscribe now to protect your connection.
Sorry, we are unable to connect your Firefox Account to a current subscription. Please try again or contact our support team for further assistance.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, no hemos podido conectar tu cuenta de Firefox a una suscripción actual. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo o ponte en contacto con nuestro equipo de soporte para obtener más ayuda.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to confirm your subscription. Please try again or contact our support team for help.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, no pudimos confirmar tu suscripción. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo o ponte en contacto con nuestro equipo de soporte para obtener ayuda.

trans-unit.source: Another Firefox Account has already subscribed using this Apple ID. Please sign out and try again or contact our support team for help.
trans-unit.target: Otra cuenta de Firefox ya se ha suscrito usando este Apple ID. Cierra sesión e inténtalo de nuevo o comunícate con nuestro equipo de soporte para obtener ayuda.

trans-unit.source: This server location is temporarily unavailable. Choose a new location.
trans-unit.target: Esta ubicación del servidor no está disponible temporalmente. Elige una nueva ubicación.

trans-unit.source: This server location is temporarily unavailable. Please open the app to choose a new location.
trans-unit.target: Esta ubicación del servidor no está disponible temporalmente. Por favor, abre la aplicación para elegir una nueva ubicación.

trans-unit.source: The server has been blocked. Check your firewall settings.
trans-unit.target: El servidor ha sido bloqueado. Comprueba la configuración de tu firewall.

trans-unit.source: Get notified when connecting to a server location failed
trans-unit.target: Recibir una notificación cuando falle la conexión a una ubicación del servidor

trans-unit.note: Body text of an expandable info card on the recommended servers list.
trans-unit.target: Estas ubicaciones están ordenadas por rendimiento esperado.
trans-unit.source: These locations are sorted by expected performance.

trans-unit.note: Title of an expandable info card on the recommended servers list.
Accessible label for the button that triggers a refresh of the recommended servers list.

The time (or in extremely rare circumstances, the date, day of the week, or "yesterday") which the recommended servers list was last updated and instructions to re-enable the refresh button. Argument is the time or date/day
trans-unit.target: Última actualización: %1. Para actualizar esta lista, desconéctate de la VPN.
trans-unit.source: Last updated: %1. To update this list please disconnect from the VPN.

trans-unit.note: The time (or in extremely rare circumstances, the date, day of the week, or "yesterday") which the recommended servers list was last updated. Argument is the time or date/day
Loading string while recommended servers are being calculated. Argument is the percentage of completion as an integer (i.e. 25)

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: Sin resultados. Prueba una búsqueda diferente

Button label that reads out a city name whose connection is unavailable. Argument is the city name.
Button label that reads out a city name whose connection is poor. Argument is the city name.
Label for the “all” servers tab
Label for the “recommended” servers tab
Button label to clear all apps from the exclusions list
This is the description of a checkbox option to allow the app to send crash reports without a user prompt
trans-unit.target: Permitir a Mozilla VPN enviar automáticamente reportes de errores para ayudar a corregir errores inesperados
trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to automatically send crash reports to help fix unexpected crashes
Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical, interaction, and campaign and referral data to Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Permitir que Mozilla VPN envíe datos técnicos, de interacción, de campañas y referencias a Mozilla

trans-unit.source: Resolve websites using a custom DNS
trans-unit.target: Resolver sitios web usando un DNS personalizado

trans-unit.source: Invalid DNS, please try a new one
trans-unit.target: DNS no válido, por favor, prueba con uno nuevo

trans-unit.source: Changing these settings will cause the VPN to disconnect and reconnect automatically.
trans-unit.target: Cambiar estos ajustes hará que la VPN se desconecte y se vuelva a conectar automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: Resolve websites using Mozilla VPN’s standard DNS
trans-unit.target: Resolver sitios web usando el DNS estándar de Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: These options may cause some websites to break or not display content correctly.
trans-unit.target: Estas opciones pueden hacer que algunos sitios web se interrumpan o no muestren el contenido correctamente.

trans-unit.source: Reduces the number of ads you see when you’re using VPN
trans-unit.target: Reduce el número de anuncios que miras cuando usas una VPN

trans-unit.source: These options may cause some websites to break or not display content correctly.
trans-unit.target: Estas opciones pueden hacer que algunos sitios web se interrumpan o no muestren el contenido correctamente.

trans-unit.source: Helps protect you from ransomware, phishing, spyware, viruses, and malware
trans-unit.target: Te ayuda a protegerte contra ransomware, phishing, spyware, virus y malware

trans-unit.source: Fewer harmful domains will be able to track you
Mozilla VPN will launch and connect when you start up your device
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN se iniciará y se conectará cuando enciendas tu dispositivo

trans-unit.note: Startup refers to a device's startup, not the VPN client's.

trans-unit.source: VPN must be restarted to take effect
trans-unit.target: La VPN debe reiniciarse para que surta efecto

trans-unit.source: Show or hide the developer options menu
trans-unit.target: Mostrar u ocultar el menú de opciones de desarrollador

trans-unit.source: Staging services are used to test features before they go live to production
trans-unit.target: Los servicios de prueba se utilizan para probar las funcionalidades antes de que lleguen a la producción

trans-unit.note: Displays inside the information card at the top of the app exclusions screen when the VPN is on
trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit App exclusions

trans-unit.note: This displays as informational text below split tunneling settings. The link directs to a sumo article which will help certain users who are having network issues using this feature.

trans-unit.source: For any questions about setting app exclusions, we’ve provided some helpful tips on our website.

Headline of telemetry policy view and checkbox label

trans-unit.source: We strive to provide you with choices and collect only the data we need to improve Mozilla VPN. Sharing this data with Mozilla is optional.
trans-unit.target: Nos esforzamos por ofrecerte opciones y solo recopilar los datos que necesitamos para mejorar Mozilla VPN. Compartir estos datos con Mozilla es opcional.

trans-unit.note: Button label

trans-unit.source: Learn more about what data Mozilla collects and how it’s used.
Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical, interaction, and campaign and referral data to Mozilla?
trans-unit.target: ¿Permitir que Mozilla VPN envíe datos técnicos, de interacción, y campañas y referencias a Mozilla?

trans-unit.source: Let us help you learn more about Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Permítenos ayudarte a saber más sobre Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Here’s a great list of useful tips and tricks to get the best out of your Mozilla VPN experience. Check it out now or find it anytime in the settings.
trans-unit.target: Aquí hay una gran lista de consejos útiles y trucos para sacar el mejor provecho de Mozilla VPN. Échale un vistazo ahora o encuéntrala en cualquier momento en los ajustes.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Mozilla VPN’s advanced features
trans-unit.target: Aprende a usar las funciones avanzadas de Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Let us help you get the most out of Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Permítenos ayudarte a obtener el máximo de Mozilla VPN
Consejos y trucos para la VPN

trans-unit.note: Tab title for the general tab of the Tips & Tricks panels
Tab title for the tab of the Tips & Tricks panels that only shows guides
Tab title for the tab of the Tips & Tricks panels that only shows tutorials

trans-unit.source: Learn the basics of Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Conoce lo básico de Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Looks like you haven’t finished the tutorial quite yet. Would you like to continue and finish now or quit and come back later?
trans-unit.target: Parece que aún no has terminado el tutorial. ¿Te gustaría continuar y terminar ahora o salir y volver después?

trans-unit.source: By continuing this tutorial, you will be changing your VPN settings. These settings will revert to their original state upon completion or quitting of the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Al continuar con este tutorial, cambiará la configuración de tu VPN. Estas configuraciones volverán a su estado original al finalizar o salir del tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You currently have the latest version of Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Actualmente tienes la última versión de Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Click to update to the latest version of the application
trans-unit.target: Haz clic para actualizar a la última versión de la aplicación
